author: Adam Vjestica
title: Virgin Mobile and Sky Mobile give phone customers 10GB of data for free
description: Virgin Mobile and Sky Mobile customers will receive 10GB of free data and unlimited calls to landlines.
content:
Virgin Mobile and Sky Mobile are giving its customers an extra 10GB of data for free to help ease communication worries during the coronavirus outbreak. 
From March 23, all Virgin Mobile pay monthly customers will receive an extra 10GB of data, along with un… [+896 chars]
